Package aksoy.cipher

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Cipher
    The interface Cipher provides two methods to be overwritten by any class it gets implemented in.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EncController  
    EncModel  
    EncView  
    KeywordCipher
    Uses the class MonoAlphabeticCipher's basic functionality to encrypt and decrypt text.
    MonoAlphabeticCipher
    MonoAlphabeticCipher is the class that contains the basic functionalities like encryption and decryption and the changing of the secret alphabet.
    ShiftCipher
    The ShiftCipher class inherits MonoAlphabeticCipher's functionalities and expands on it by adding the shift cipher.
    SubstitutionCipher
    Uses the class MonoAlphabeticCipher's basic functionality to encrypt and decrypt text.
    test
    The class test creates an instance of EncController.
    TranspositionCipher
    The class TranspositionCipher implements Cipher's methods.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CipherCharException
    This custom exception is used for MonoAlphabeticCipher.
    CipherDuplicateException
    This custom exception is used for MonoAlphabeticCipher.
    CipherException
    This custom exception is used for MonoAlphabeticCipher.
    CipherLengthException
    This custom exception is used for MonoAlphabeticCipher.
    NoKeywordException
    This custom exception is used for KeywordCipher.
    TPException
    The class TPException is thrown when an invalid value for the transposition level is entered (ex. -5).
